step3.title: Your best work experience
step3.question1: Which period do you think back to with great pleasure? What made that time so enjoyable? What did you do?
step3.question2: Can you mention another nice period or project? What did you mainly do then?
step3.question3: When do you come home whistling? What did you do and experience on such a day?
step3.placeholder1: Share your story about a wonderful work period here...
step3.placeholder2: Tell about another nice experience here...
step3.placeholder3: Describe such a perfect workday here...

intro.title: You're almost there!
intro.description: This is the final step in Vinster. You've done your research and now you're going to create your search profile. A search profile is a clear overview of the job you're looking for.

benefits.better_conversations_desc: Have targeted conversations with your network
benefits.visibility_desc: Let others know what you're looking for

profiel_voltooien.title: Two final steps to generate your career report
profiel_voltooien.description: You'll first fill in some additional information about yourself. Then you'll indicate what's most important to you from your previous answers.

step3.title: Dream job 3
step3.subtitle: What would you like to do for a while, or even always?
step3.job_title_placeholder: Enter the name of your dream job here...

voltooi.title: Congratulations! ðŸŽ‰
voltooi.subtitle: You have successfully completed the questions about your dream jobs
voltooi.what_happened_description: Keywords have now been compiled to determine what you find important in your work
voltooi.next_step_description: To generate your personal career report, we need some additional information from you:
voltooi.priorities_description: The keywords are divided into 3 parts: activities, interests and working conditions. It is now up to you to emphasize the keywords that you find most important.
voltooi.extra_info_description: Additional questions about your background. Think of information such as your education and education level, but also whether there is a specific sector you want to search in.
voltooi.report_description: Receive your personal career advice. After we have received all information from you, you will receive a complete personal career report that you can continue with!
voltooi.tip_text: ðŸ’¡ You can always create your career report later via the dashboard
